roleset.name: shake from cold or fear
roleset.note: SHIVER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls body_internal_states-40.6, hiccup-40.1.1. (from shiver.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: When I realized it was over, I-2 went and stood out in front of the house, waiting and praying for Merrill to come home, [*-2] shivering as if it were 20 below zero until he got there.
example.arg: as if it were 20 below zero
